modName: Geralt Light Armor - NO Skinny Pants -
summary: Geralt jacket as light armor, but without the skinny shit - Image later on- if i dont get kick out xD
descriptionHtml:
Hello guys, well im not a modder by any means, this isnt my work, i only took what i like from other and put it together.

You could call this a retext of ...

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6006//?   by hucifer

With mix of http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5588/?  by LordOfWar

So what this does?

This mod took the best from both, like the temper and craft from \"hucifer\" and uses the meshes from \"LordOfWar\" to give the armor a more manly and not a sissy pant\'s look.

This for the most part will only add the armos of \"hucifer\" as he made it in the begining but with LordOfWar meshes, so ... no sword not nothing else just the armor and you\'ll find it in the MISC secction. 

Plis, dont ask me anything, i cant do anything, and u should really go to original autor and said ey dude GREAT job n.n 

BUG\'s

1.- Minor cliping in the neck 
2.- You should probably Temper it before enchanting, it may not let u temper after.
author: Jacks
